description: This file defines API routes for a finance tracking backend, including user authentication, transaction management, dashboard statistics, and budgeting analytics, implemented using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: register(user: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal))
methods.description: Handles user registration by creating a new user with hashed password.

methods.name: login(user: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal))
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: create_transaction(transaction: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
methods.description: Creates a new financial transaction for the logged-in user.

methods.name: list_transactions(db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = 30)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of transactions for the current user.

methods.name: get_transaction(trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
methods.description: Fetches a specific transaction by ID for the logged-in user.

methods.name: update_transaction(trx_id: int, update: TransactionUpdate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete_transaction(trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
dashboard(db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
methods.description: Provides aggregated statistics: total income, total expense, and recent transactions.

methods.name: budget_analytics(db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
methods.description: Provides spending analytics per category with budget comparison.

ctags.name: create_transaction
ctags.signature: (transaction: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))

ctags.name: dashboard
ctags.pattern: /^def dashboard(db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current/

ctags.name: list_transactions
ctags.signature: (db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = 30)

ctags.pattern: /^def update_transaction(trx_id: int, update: TransactionUpdate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLoca/
ctags.signature: (trx_id: int, update: TransactionUpdate, db: Session = Depends(SessionLocal), current_user: User = Depends(auth.get_current_user))
